page.title: 11COMMUNITY POLICE -N.LEEDS
page.content: P.C.TINDALL wanted to be a community policeman because he thought it was a good way of getting to know everybody.He does not live in the area because if some people do not like policemen they would be able to annoy him at home.His area is approximately 3sq. kilometres, but he is sometimes called out of his area when there is a shortage of men in emergencies. He visits 5 schools and talks to them about road safety and the law. The children make friends with him and {trust}him. He also assists old people to use the new Pelican crossing on Street Lane and lets them into their homes when they lose their keys.P.C. Tindall likes his job most of the time because he likes meeting people and he likes us to see him as{a friend}who will help us if he can.
